messages.content: My family and I have lived in Walthamstow for over 20 years. I am the only candidate in this election who lives here. It's my home and my priority - that's why I'll always stand up for our community.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Securing Equality for All in Walthamstow
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Women still face discrimination in workplaces and on our streets. Working to extend maternity rights and tackle street harassment.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The Battle for Funding for Our Schools and Special Educational Needs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Schools have been hit hard by cuts. Average shortfall of £467 per pupil. Schools like Frederick Bremer and Whitefield Special Secondary needs funding.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackling the Climate Emergency in Walthamstow and Westminster
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making the case for a climate emergency and campaigning for zero-carbon target for 2030 while supporting the green economy.

issues.brexitEurope: Johnson's hard Brexit risks thousands of jobs across our country and sends the NHS to Donald Trump. It's voting for the Tories that made Brexit happen in the first place.
issues.education: Schools have been hard hit by cuts. Average shortfall of £467 per pupil. Frederick Bremer School and Whitefield Special Secondary need more funding.
issues.environment: Tackling the Climate Emergency in Walthamstow and Westminster. Campaigns for a climate emergency and a zero-carbon target for 2030.
issues.lawCrime: Tackling Knife Crime: fighting for police and youth services.

community.content: Walthamstow community equality, schools funding, tackling crime, climate emergency.

endorsements.endorsement: From the start of my journey campaigning to end FGM, Stella has stood with me every step of the way.
I've known Stella as a local campaigner for over twenty years. As someone who speaks passionately for what she believes in, I know that she’ll fight for all of us in Walthamstow!

I've known Stella as a local campaigner for over twenty years. As someone who speaks passionately for what she believes in, I know that she’ll fight for all of us in Walthamstow!

personalStories.story: From the start of my journey campaigning to end FGM, Stella has stood with me every step of the way.
I’ve known Stella as a local campaigner for over twenty years. She’s feisty and passionate.

examples: From the start of my journey campaigning to end FGM, Stella has stood with me every step of the way.

Johnson's hard Brexit risks thousands of jobs across our country and sends the NHS to Donald Trump.
It's not just the richest in power ripping us off--be it Johnson trying to bring back legal shark lenders.
